name: NewsNow Publishing Limited
goal:
NewsNow (http://www.NewsNow.co.uk) is a UK-based free-to-web real-time news aggregator and search engine, established 1997.

We publish headlines linking to breaking news from 12,500 publications from 150 countries in 19 languages.

We are the seventh-largest online media publication in the UK ranked by page views (see: https://www.similarweb.com/blog/uk-media-publications-ranking-february-2017), serving approximately 15m users monthly.

Our remit includes presenting people with links to news from all the angles, and providing a valuable source of traffic for news publishers.

Our editorial outlook â€” we believe in fairness, objectivity and credibility in news reporting.
interests: Communication, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Public consultation on the role of publishers in the copyright value chain and on the 'panorama exception'.
